name: Free Electron (Ahmadji)
description:
Free Electron is a 2D One Button Game portraying a journey in the quantum world. 

A free electron is lost in the continuum. Using the laws of quantum mechanics and classical mechanics, guide it home.

You will travel across vast molecules like benzene or water but be careful, this world is primitive.

This short game was made by Ahmadji Ursulet, a game design student at ISART DIGITAL Paris. 

LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/ahmadji-ursulet-technical-designer

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ahmadji_dev

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ahmadji_dev/

Development is currently on hold.
